description:
[NaCl SDK] nacl_io: remove default prefix for /dev/tty messages

Also fix simple_hello_world example so that the stdout is
correctly re-directed to chrome vis PostMessage.

R=binji@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=210632

messages.text:
lgtm

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js
File native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js#newcode22
native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js:22: * @param {Object} optional dictionary of args to send to DidCreateInstance
while you're here, fix this doc comment, it should have parameter name after type:

@param {Object} args ...

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js#newcode214
native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js:214: * @param {number} height The height to create the plugin.
add param documentation

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js#newcode216
native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js:216: function domContentLoaded(name, tool, path, width, height, attrs) {
consistency with above -- use args or attrs, not both

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js#newcode304
native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js:304: var args = {}
more consistency... body-attrs is converted to args, then passed above as attrs then back to args... :)

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/libraries/nacl_io/mount_dev.cc
File native_client_sdk/src/libraries/nacl_io/mount_dev.cc (left):

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/libraries/nacl_io/mount_dev.cc#oldcode199
native_client_sdk/src/libraries/nacl_io/mount_dev.cc:199: prefix_ = "_default_:";
might want to mention this removal to torinmr@ in case it breaks something in naclports.

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js
File native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js#newcode22
native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js:22: * @param {Object} optional dictionary of args to send to DidCreateInstance
On 2013/07/09 01:27:18, binji wrote:
> while you're here, fix this doc comment, it should have parameter name after
> type:
> 
> @param {Object} args ...

Done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js#newcode214
native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js:214: * @param {number} height The height to create the plugin.
On 2013/07/09 01:27:18, binji wrote:
> add param documentation

Done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js#newcode216
native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js:216: function domContentLoaded(name, tool, path, width, height, attrs) {
On 2013/07/09 01:27:18, binji wrote:
> consistency with above -- use args or attrs, not both

Done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/18341024/diff/1/native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js#newcode304
native_client_sdk/src/examples/common.js:304: var args = {}
On 2013/07/09 01:27:18, binji wrote:
> more consistency... body-attrs is converted to args, then passed above as attrs
> then back to args... :)

Done.
Committed patchset #2 manually as r210632 (presubmit successful).

subject: [NaCl SDK] nacl_io: remove default prefix for /dev/tty messages
